title: WTB: T206 Sid Smith and/or T206 Elberfeld (wash. port.)

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Sid Smith and/or T206 Elberfeld (wash. port.)
posts.post_content:
Nearing the end of my 520 Monster.  Want to buy a lower grade T206 Sid Smith and a lower grade T206 Elberfeld Washington Portrait.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks.
I think you want a better Sid Smith then this but let me know. Good luck in finding what you need. D.
